name: escrownet-sdk
description: The **EscrowNet SDK** is a JavaScript/TypeScript library that enables developers to integrate secure escrow functionality into their applications on [Starknet](https://starknet.io/), a Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum. The SDK provides a simple and secure interface for interacting with EscrowNet’s smart contracts, supporting features like user registration, escrow creation, and fund management. Built with Starknet’s native Account Abstraction (AA) and session-based authentication, it simplifies complex blockchain interactions for developers building decentralized applications (dApps).
